org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.fhir

Class RequestDetailProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.interceptor.InterceptorAdapter
      • org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.fhir.RequestDetailProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.interceptor.IServerInterceptor

    public class RequestDetailProvider
extends ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.interceptor.InterceptorAdapter
    Track the RequestDetails and make it available to downstream processing. This needs to be thread local, because the request details are normally not forwarded to the resource provider methods.
    Since:
    3.5
    Author:
    Christian Ohr
